message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, and I'm excited to see if it aligns with your needs.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget considerations, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $12,500. Can you consider that?
